explorer.ui
Class PreferencesDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      explorer.ui.PreferencesDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, fr.esrf.tangoatk.widget.util.IControlee, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PreferencesDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements fr.esrf.tangoatk.widget.util.IControlee

PreferencesDialog is a singleton class, since you normally only need one of them in an application. Use getInstance to get hold of it.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Erik Assum
